Na razie studio [b] Behaviour Interactive pokazało tylko tyle że [u] ma na graczy wywalone [/u] i chce tylko utrzymać fan base(żeby przychód nie zmalał) cosmetykami wypuszczanymi praktycznie co tydzień oraz kolejnymi killerami i ocalałymi.
Unlucky [/b]

The game is very good. The atmosphere and, in general, the process itself. There are many characters, they even have skins. When I first entered the game and saw Trickster, I thought that the collaboration with BTS, now this is my favorite character

Honestly one of the most terrifying games I've ever played.

I'll be wandering the map alone and then out of the blue, I get attacked by an old fart with a flashlight who clicks it at me and it's really annoying. Or sometimes I'll go to a locker to replenish my tools and a pizza delivery guy will be hiding in it. Thankfully I can defend myself, but even so, the enemies can be dickheads and it takes a toll on your psyche. Oftentimes they're nice which makes it all the more jarring when they taunt you and say really awful stuff in the postgame chat.

Easily one of the best psychological horror games on the market.
这个游戏就是单边游戏，屠夫没有游戏体验，不是人类车队，就是烧图恶心人，特别是韩国棒子，真的没品。

I wouldn't call it a "good" game, but it's addictive, entertaining and perpetually infuriating.

EDIT: I will buy every DLC the minute it releases.

EDIT x2: I will no longer by every DLC the minute it releases. Desync on killer hits isn't fun. Still at it's core a good game.

Love this game! Mainly play on console but came to pc to try something different and its just as fun... just a lot of getting used too. I'm looking forward to that new resident evil chapter coming out in June 2021!!

Reglas simples: 1 asesino vs 4 supervivientes. 
Los supervivientes tienen que reparar una cantidad de motores para abrir una puerta y escapar mientras el asesino los acecha e intenta matar para evitar su escape.
Con una serie de habilidades y caracteristicas unicas las cuales pueden enseñarse a otros personajes tanto entre asesinos como entre supervivientes, el juego ofrece un abanico de estrategias de lados ambos.

PROS: - Buen diseño de Personajes y ambiente (DLC con personajes y mapas de peliculas y otros unicos del juego)
           - Propuesta Interesante y unica en su genero
           - Actualizaciones constantes
           - Para jugar solo como asesino o de superviviente con amigos.
           - Sistema de Crossplay para jugar entre jugadores de PC y Consolas que garantiza encontrar partida a cualquier hora del dia.
           - DLC a precios accesibles.

CONTRAS: - Demasiados bugs, a pesar de los parches siempre hay un bug nuevo.
                  - Comunidad Toxica, hay gente buena onda pero existe una rivalidad killers vs survivals que genera un ambiente muy toxico.
                  -  Bans inexistentes, gente que insulta, abusa de bugs y/o mecanicas.

A CAMBIAR: - Ciertas habilidades que arruinan la experiencia de juego, tanto de asesinos que terminan partidas en 5 minutos como de supervivientes que reparan todo en la misma cantidad de tiempo.
                     - Sistema de rankeo, se sube muy facil a rangos altos sin ningun tipo de recompensa final por temporada (todos los 13 de cada mes).
                     - El actual sistema de castigos por desconexion, no esta mal pero falta pulir, 5 minutos por desconexion de partidas que se acumula a medida que se hace seguido pero facil de evadir.

 CONCLUSION:
Un muy Buen Juego, en el ultimo tiempo se nota que estan metiendo mas dedicacion y mejoraron mucho, falta por mejorar, pero van en buen camino.
Divertido y Frustrante a la vez. Horas de diversion y rage garantizadas.

Might be a dying game. Que times take way to long sometimes as well as no chat between console and PC players .You get lucky not getting a killer that camps hooks etc. Currency sync Error is ruining my experience. I survive to get blood points but this New (Currency Sync Error) doesn't allow me to collect blood points when i survive making it unplayable as survivor. I don't even want to play killer because it would be a waste of my time now. Some of the mechanics that allow players to be hit over pallets after taking a few steps is annoying (noodle arm). This game is fun with friends but other then that i don't see myself playing it alone really. The hag needs to have those pentagram hexes she places down nerfed. under a chase sometimes vaulting through windows makes you crawl through them slowly even though running, allowing killers to grab/spank you where you should have been able to jump though while running getting that extra few feet of room. Better with friends.
i love this game. i never found interest in playing it but wow.. its just fun and cool to be your favorite horror killers.
